abstract: YP, one of the largest mobile advertising companies in the United States, is acquiring Sense Networks, which mines location and behavioral data to provide targeted search and display ads.
snippet: YP, one of the largest mobile advertising companies in the United States, is acquiring Sense Networks, which mines location and behavioral data to provide targeted search and display ads.
lead_paragraph: YP, the local search and advertising company owned by Cerberus Capital Management and AT&T, said on Monday that it had acquired Sense Networks, a mobile ad company.

headline.main: YP, a Mobile Search Firm, Buys Sense Networks
